SRP.Q: In 1971, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Lumina Energy Market relative to GeoHeat Commodity?
SRP.A: In 1971, Lumina Energy Market is {below} GeoHeat Commodity in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On GeoHeat Commodity, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1970 relative to that in 1974 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On GeoHeat Commodity, the data point in 1970 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1974.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Lumina Energy Market's Natural Gas Prices levels?
VPR.A: Lumina Energy Market's natural gas prices levels show a {exponential falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of GeoHeat Commodity's Natural Gas Prices levels?
VPR.A: GeoHeat Commodity's natural gas prices levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: Which line shows a exponential falling trend in Natural Gas Prices levels?
Which line shows a stable falling trend in Natural Gas Prices levels?

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1974, which line experienced a larger change in Natural Gas Prices, Lumina Energy Market or GeoHeat Commodity?
NC.A: {Lumina Energy Market} experienced a larger change in natural gas prices.

NC.Q: In 1967, which line had a higher Natural Gas Prices, {GeoHeat Commodity} or {Lumina Energy Market}?
NC.A: In 1967, {GeoHeat Commodity} had a higher natural gas prices.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1974, which line had a higher average Natural Gas Prices, Lumina Energy Market or GeoHeat Commodity?
NC.A: {GeoHeat Commodity} had a higher average natural gas prices.

NC.Q: Was Lumina Energy Market's Natural Gas Prices in 1968 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The natural gas prices in 1968 was {higher} than in 1973.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the GeoHeat Commodity. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(2 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1967, 1975}.
